meanings.definition: Very large in size, quantity, or extent.
meanings.sent1: The elephant was enormous, taking up the entire room.
meanings.sent2: The cake was enormous, enough to feed the whole party.
meanings.sent3: The cat tried to hide behind the enormous plant, thinking it was invisible.
meanings.sent4: Her smile was as enormous as the sun, lighting up the room.
meanings.sent5: The mountain loomed before them, an enormous obstacle in their path.

meanings.sent1: The fireworks display was enormous, filling the sky with color.
meanings.sent2: The singer's talent was enormous, captivating the audience.
meanings.sent3: The toddler's attempt at a cartwheel was met with an enormous round of applause.
meanings.sent4: His generosity was as enormous as the ocean, never-ending and deep.
meanings.sent5: The impact of her words was enormous, resonating with everyone in the room.
